Improve DocScan by sending us a log. Please note that we do not log personal data. Do you want to share your log file now? OK DocScan - Log
holl@cvl.tuwien.ac.at We highly appreciate your feedback! You can leave us a comment here:

It is necessary to allow DocScan to access your Dropbox account. This authentication will be done in your browser. Dropbox Authentication Start authentication Authenticating... Not authenticated Could not authenticate with Dropbox. If you are a developer, you probably want the API key. In that case, take a look at the readme.

Log in
Open Source Licenses
DocScan 2019 Version: Built: Show DocScan intro Open Source Licenses DocScan is developed together with the ScanTent device. Visit our website for more information: \nhttps://scantent.eu DocScan features image uploads to Transkribus. Visit the Transkribus website for further information: \nhttps://transkribus.eu#
This app is especially designed for the ScanTent.\nIf you own a ScanTent: Please put your document inside. Place your phone on the ScanTent Start the series mode in the app Flip pages - images are captured automatically.\n Your scanned images are grouped into documents.\nDocuments can be exported as PDF and uploaded. Trigger flash after automatic imaging to show that an image has been taken. Create a document now Skip
Edit document Save changes
Create new document Document name Create document Show Transkribus metadata Authority This metadata is uploaded to Transkribus but not to other cloud storages. Author Writer Genre Signature URL
Warp image Image not transformed The image could not be transformed. Please try to adjust the cropping rectangle.
Upload Mobile data Enable uploads over mobile data connection. Additional charges by your provider may arise. Image processing Fast page detection Measure focus Fast page detection with a potential loss of accuracy Display grid Overlays a grid on the camera view Flash after imaging Activates the flash for a second to show that a picture has been taken. This applies only to the series mode.
Debug settings Live preview Show focus values Show debug view Show computation time of several tasks on top of the camera preview. Debug settings Settings used mainly for development and measurement of the app performance. Use Transkribus test server Please restart the app, if you change this. Warning: This setting should only be used for testing the app and the Transkribus server. Show HUD button Shows a button in the camera view for mirroring the screen. This is useful if you use a mirror or a Head Up Display (HUD) with your ScanTent.
Exif settings Default metadata values saved within images Photographer
Copyright

Delete Cancel OCR not available Sorry, we could not find Google Play services. Try to reinstall the app via Google Play store. Do you want to generate a PDF without OCR? Make PDF machine readable? This will apply OCR and make the text in the picture(s) selectable. Replace images? This will replace the original images and cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue? Images are partially not focused Info Focus issues Some images appear to be not focused and should be checked and eventually be replaced. These images are marked with a red rectangle.
